text: Leonardo da Vinci (1452–1519) was an Italian Renaissance polymath. Leonardo da Vinci may also refer to: *Leonardo da Vinci (comics), a Marvel Comics character *Leonardo da Vinci (Stanley book) *Leonardo da Vinci (video game), a 1997 educational game *Italian submarine Leonardo da Vinci, launched in 1939 *Italian submarine Leonardo da Vinci (S 510), commissioned in the Italian Navy in 1955 *Italian battleship Leonardo da Vinci *Leonardo da Vinci programme, a European Commission funding programme *Leonardo da Vinci–Fiumicino Airport ==See also== *Leonardo Vinci (1690–1730), Italian composer best known for his operas. *Leonardo DiCaprio
title: Leonardo da Vinci (disambiguation)
